/* replicated event ports */
#define ifitem_index (((etReplSubPort*)ifitem)->index)

/* services */

#define ACC_choicePoint1(dist, velo, tl, cnum) ACC_ACC_choicePoint1(self, dist, velo, tl, cnum)

#define speed_up(dist, velo) ACC_speed_up(self, dist, velo)
